text: Because he forsook me, and sacrificed to Astarte the abomination of the Sidonians, and to Chamos, and to the idols of Moab, and to 11. 33 Or, Moloch, or Milcom.their king the 11. 33 Or, provocation.abomination of the children of Ammon, and he walked not in my ways, to do that which was right before me, as David his father did.
